title: SB
body: What does this mean? Every game i play from 12am till early morning a lot of people say this.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LPr7sweW,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-03-18T02:56:54.854+0000)
>
> people simply say bs.

bullshit such? that doesn't make sense.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LPr7sweW,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-03-18T03:34:14.823+0000)
>
> bullshit such? that doesn't make sense.

bs is simply BullShit

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LPr7sweW,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-18T07:17:29.662+0000)
>
> bs is simply BullShit

why do you capitalise the B in bull and the S in shit in the word bullshit, but not the acronym for it?
just to emphasise the letters in it

SB is the 'acronym' for the pronunciation of the most common chinese insult.
People who use this are:
- Chinese Twelvies
- Chinese people who think they're superior
- Chinese tryhards
- Chinese people who think speaking Chinese (in fking english letters) is cool in OCE
- Chinese players who blame everyone for their mistakes and call them SB
- Chinese kids who think they're UZI in every game

The full word is pronounced "sah bii"

Fuk man I hate it when people mindlessly call me Chinese...I don't wanna be compared to those rude, ignorant, stuck-up, arrogant, irrational, pretentious, loud, uneducated asians...

And a message to those Chinese people who were either born in the Western society or grew up in the Western society, you guys are fine, and I bet you all feel me
Somebody, scoreboard or should be, you mostly see it in contest like "sb help/leash me" (Somebody), "What's your cs yasuo?" "Check the sb" (scoreboard) or "sb dead, how you survive" (Should be)

Sucks bro.
Suck breats
Sleep babe
Stupid %%%%%

Urban dictionary: SB (Small Boto)- a person who cant do work and forwards messages . Someone who has to ask another person for help when trying to get at a chic .
